channel.title: Facebook on Le murmure de Julian
channel.description: Recent content in Facebook on Le murmure de Julian

item.title: Account Kit samples for Swift
item.description: 做一個網路服務, 使用者驗證是蠻麻煩的一件事, 我們是可以裝作沒看到, 不做驗證, 但這樣的下場就是有假使用者, 有殭屍, 最簡單的方式是信任第三方服務

item.title: [筆記] "Unsafe JavaScript attempt to access frame with URL" error with Facebook Javascript API
item.description: The following example shows how to create a simple Facebook login button with Facebook javascript API: Normally, this page would be reloaded if user finished authorized your app. But it won’t be reloaded in Chrome due to the follwing error: Unsafe JavaScript attempt to access frame with URL https://s-static.ak.fbcdn.net/connect/xd_proxy.php?version=3#cb=f363e58d9&origin=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.ab.com%2Ffcb27588&relation=opener&transport=postmessage&frame=fac4c0f18&access_token=AAAEHZBpoK3B0BALv8Cf96gaKEnn4ZBtXgjCOQCFFhVDL4K0rZAE2NGDcqZCPlZByNNKEDmYSGKHQv8jAUM2yGZCHkOcyXUKhoZD&expires_in=0&signed_request=g7sYd_XQx-EBPtQQGk-0ISRMrUDnT4L4WHAmlNsVFBU. from frame with URL http://www.ab.com/login.html. Domains, protocols and ports must match. Some people use FB.getLoginStatus() to check if user authorized app

item.title: Social Network的 人、事、時、地、物
item.description: 我們的生活周遭不外乎就是以人、事、時、地、物 所構成, 人與人之間的互動, 事件的發生 等等 每個Social Network Service正是在想辦法把我們的生活

item.title: [筆記] Translate open graph activity
item.description: Go to Facebook developer :https://developers.facebook.com/apps Select your app Click “Edit Setting” Choose “Translate your app” at left hand side You’ll see a form as following. Select your language and translate all messages:

item.title: [筆記][測試] Facebook Open graph + Heroku + node.js
item.description: Open graph的確是個好物, 雖然說早在去年的f8就已經推出了, 但現在更加完備了, 其實也等不及看會有啥應用推出了, 當然自己也想來玩看看, 本想照T

item.title: My first "Timeline"
item.description: Facebook今天發表的Timeline真是令人興奮的功能呀 現在應該再也沒人說很難用Facebook當日記了(雖然我講日記這概念講很久都沒

item.title: Generating Facebook key hash for Android
item.description: According toFacebook mobile development document (Android), you need to generate a key hash for your application in order to apply Facebook SSO(Single Sign on). Here is the formal way to do this: keytool -exportcert -alias androiddebugkey -keystore ~/.android/debug.keystore | openssl sha1 -binary | openssl base64 But sometimes you won’t have a tradtional key store especially when building with Android open sources. Keys in Android open sources are in pk8 format.

item.title: Recognize your friend with Face.com
item.description: 替照片上的每個人都加上標籤(tag)是一個蠻好用的功能, 這可以方便你找到有某人的照片, 或是一群人在某時的合照, 如果善加利用是相當好用的功能,

item.title: Facebook 能做些什麼？
item.description: 剛在捷運上看到一位小姐拿著iPhone 在看她Facebook上的news feed。她同時也編輯著她Bump上的資訊(我猜可能是新買的手機吧)

item.title: [Android][筆記] Single Sign on with Facebook SDK
item.description: 透過Facebook Android SDK去sign in Facebook其實很單純, 只需要這樣幾行code: if (!facebook.isSessionValid()) { facebook.authorize(this, new String[] { “publish_stream” }, new AuthDialogListener()); } 其中AuthDialog
